generated_body: The article likely discusses the recent charges brought against a roommate and her boyfriend in connection with the death of a missing Atlanta student. Readers can expect an overview of the circumstances surrounding the investigation, including details about the student's disappearance and the evidence that led to the arrests. It may also provide insights into the legal proceedings ahead, as well as any statements from law enforcement or family members. The article is likely to explore the implications of this case within the broader context of missing person investigations.
